body:
Jack de Valpine wrote:
>
> Note for those interested, it appears that Ecotect has been purchased 
> by Autodesk..... (press release as of June 26)


Whoa, that's news to me!  Congrats to Andrew, and here's hoping Autodesk 
doesn't screw this one up like they did Lightscape. 


- Rob
